subject: RE: [junit] Problem extending JUnit TestCase class
msgSnippet: ... maybe make sure the base class does not end in *Test or *TestCase? hth
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: rb [mailto:richardbondi@...]
> Sent: Friday, January 30, 2004 12:08 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Problem extending JUnit TestCase class
>
> ... I created on base class extending TestCase...
>
> ...when I try to run all the methods in a test class, JUnit
> complains that the *base* class has no test methods -- which of couse
> it doesn't....

maybe make sure the base class does not end in *Test or *TestCase?

hth
